name: The Live Debate Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which TV host or hosts opened the episode?
questions.explanation:
Ellen Degeneres.

	Ellen talked about the new One card by American Express.

Forrest Sawyer.

	Forrest Sawyer was an award winning news anchor for NBC and MSNBC.

questions.correct: None of the microphones went bad
options: Both of them went out at the same time
questions.explanation:
None of the microphones went bad.

	During an answer to a question on Medicare, Santos left the podium microphone. In order for him to be able to move around and still speak so he could be heard, Santos was given a hand held microphone. Santos gave Vinick his microphone later when Vinick requested one.

questions.text: Someone burped on camera during the debate.
questions.explanation:
False.

	What sounds like a burp is actually the moderator trying to interrupt Santos' speech.

questions.text: What was Santos' answer to the moratorium on the federal death penalty?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	When asked what he thought about a moratorium on the federal death penalty, Santos said yes. When Vinick was asked the same question, he said no. Neither one of them elaborated further on the subject.

questions.text: Who was called a liar by one of the audience members during his rebuttal of the other candidate's answer?
options: Both of them were called liars
questions.explanation:
Vinick.

	Santos had just completed answering the question about how HeadStart does help young children, but as they get older the school system lets them down. Vinick said that was a lie and a male audience member stood up and called Vinick a liar.

questions.text: Santos asked for the debate rules to be disregarded so he and Vinick could have a real debate
questions.explanation:
False.

	Vinick asked for the debate rules to be disregarded after the moderator read them off. Santos agreed.

questions.text: What word did Vinick say Democrats thought was bad?
questions.explanation:
liberal.

	Santos said that Republicans think liberal is a bad word, but liberals got women to vote, ended segregation, and put an end to slavery.

questions.text: When discussing gun control, how many guns did Santos say he owned?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Santos: "There are at least 200 million guns in this country and I own three of them." Santos went on to say don't control the guns, but the bullets.

questions.text: Santos won the coin toss to go first in the closing statements.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Santos: "Ask yourself if your ready to give Matt Santos the Presidency of the United States."
